General.Name: Tasty Bite Eatables Limited
General.Description: Tasty Bite Eatables Limited manufactures and sells ready-to-eat food, and formed frozen food and specialty sauces under the Tasty Bite brand name in India and internationally. The company offers entrées, ready-to-cook sauces, organic rice, and whole-grain preparations, as well as gravies and pastes. It sells its products through retail stores. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Pune, India. Tasty Bite Eatables Limited is a subsidiary of Preferred Brands Foods (India) Private Limited.

1.Name: Mr. Rajendra A. Jadhav
1.Title: Whole Time Director & GM of Works
